mapper.insert: insert into category (category_id, category_pid, category_name, category_desc, category_img, user_id, category_status) values (#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update category set category_pid = #{categoryPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_name = #{categoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_desc = #{categoryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category_img = #{categoryImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, category_status = #{categoryStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, category_pid, category_name, category_desc, category_img, user_id, category_status from category where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select category_id, category_pid, category_name, category_desc, category_img, user_id, category_status from category
